mapper.sql: SELECT DISTINCT u.user_id AS user_id, ap.app_id AS app_id, m.menu_id AS menu_id, m.application_id AS application_id, m.type AS type, m.name AS name, m.description AS description, m.code AS code, m.parent_code AS parent_code, m.icon AS icon, m.url AS url, m.order_num AS order_num, m.status AS status FROM gar_users u LEFT JOIN gar_user_application ap ON ap.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gar_user_dept ud ON ud.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN gar_role_dept rd ON rd.dept_id = ud.dept_id LEFT JOIN gar_role_authority ra ON ra.role_id = rd.role_id LEFT JOIN gar_authority_menu am ON am.authority_id = ra.authority_id LEFT JOIN gar_menus m ON m.menu_id = am.menu_id WHERE m.status = 1
mapper.select: SELECT um.* FROM () AS um WHERE um.user_id =#{userId} AND um.type = #{type}
SELECT um.* FROM () AS um WHERE um.user_id = #{userId} AND app_id = #{appId} AND parent_code = #{parentCode} ORDER BY order_num ASC
SELECT um.code FROM () AS um WHERE um.user_id = #{userId} AND um.app_id = #{appId} AND um.type = 2
